metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2013-0277 -- dnsmasq security, bug fix and enhancement update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[2.48-13] - Fix the DHCP RELEASE problem when two or more dnsmasq instances are running (rhbz#887156)
[2.48-12] - Fixing initscript restart stop functions (rhbz#850944)
[2.48-11] - Revert previous changes because of many problems with --bind-dynamic option backport. - Dropping dnsmasq-2.48-add-bind-dynamic-option.patch - Set SO_BINDTODEVICE socket option when using --bind-interfaces (rhbz#884957)
[2.48-10] - Fixed dnsmasq-2.48-add-bind-dynamic-option.patch - the option --bind-dynamic was not set correctly when used
[2.48-9] - Added cc flag -fno-strict-aliasing to solve Testsuite regressions
[2.48-8] - Fix CVE-2012-3411 (rhbz#882251)
[2.48-7] - Fix lease-change script (rhbz#815819) - Check tftp-root exists and is accessible at startup (rhbz#824214)
